title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Skills: Simulation-Based Problem-Solving Training for Enhanced Diagnostic Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Social Studies Content Knowledge and Fundamental Diagnostic Assessment Principles
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose at least three learning gaps by analyzing student cases presented in simulation environments
